articles.title: Study finds abrupt decline in the prevalence of cognitive impairment among older Americans - News-Medical.Net
articles.description: A new nationally representative study published online in the Journal of Alzheimer's Disease found an abrupt decline in the prevalence of cognitive impairment among American adults aged 65 and older compared to the same age group a decade earlier.
